title: Introducing: Jelani Blackman
body:
Londoner [**Jelani Blackman**](https://twitter.

com/jelani_blackman) steps up with his first track _Twenty//Three._ His debut sound expertly blends various textures of soft guitar riffs and bass with his fresh, [King Krule](http://kingkrule.co.uk/)\-style vocals, sure to get you toe-tapping. This cleverly composed track is luxuriously  refined and taking R&B to a new and exciting place … I’ll be eagerly awaiting Jelani’s next move.

excerpt.full: Londoner Jelani Blackman steps up with his first track Twenty//Three. His debut sound expertly blends various textures of soft guitar riffs and bass with his fresh, King Krule-style vocals, sure to get you toe-tapping. This cleverly composed track is luxuriously  refined and taking R&B to a new and exciting place … I’ll be eagerly awaiting Jelani’s next move.
excerpt.short: Londoner  Jelani Blackman  steps up with his first track Twenty//Three.
